languages.text: {n}Вы пытаетесь скрыться от внимания толпы, но не успеваете — простолюдины окружают вас как стая стервятников, глядя на вас словно на диковинного зверька.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Пока слуги отвлечены, вы без труда скрываетесь от их любопытного взора.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You try to evade the crowd's attention, only for the commoners to descend upon you like so many vultures. They stare at you as if you were a rare and bizarre animal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь скрыться от внимания толпы, но не успеваете — простолюдины окружают вас как стая стервятников, глядя на вас словно на диковинного зверька.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试图避开这三个人的注意，但他们却像秃鹫一样朝你涌来。三个人死死地盯着你，仿佛你是某种珍稀动物一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to evade the crowd's attention, only for the commoners to descend upon you like so many vultures. They stare at you as if you were a rare and bizarre animal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试图避开这三个人的注意，但他们却像秃鹫一样朝你涌来。三个人死死地盯着你，仿佛你是某种珍稀动物一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas evitar la atención del gentío, pero los plebeyos revolotean a tu alrededor como una bandada de buitres. Te miran como si fueras un animal singular.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to evade the crowd's attention, only for the commoners to descend upon you like so many vultures. They stare at you as if you were a rare and bizarre animal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas evitar la atención del gentío, pero los plebeyos revolotean a tu alrededor como una bandada de buitres. Te miran como si fueras un animal singular.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalabalığın dikkatinden kaçmaya çalışıyorsun ama avam, akbabalar gibi üzerine üşüşüyor. Sana sanki ender bulunan, tuhaf bir hayvanmışsın gibi bakıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to evade the crowd's attention, only for the commoners to descend upon you like so many vultures. They stare at you as if you were a rare and bizarre animal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalabalığın dikkatinden kaçmaya çalışıyorsun ama avam, akbabalar gibi üzerine üşüşüyor. Sana sanki ender bulunan, tuhaf bir hayvanmışsın gibi bakıyorlar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}群衆の注目を逃れようとするが、平民たちがハゲワシのように押しかけてくるだけである。彼らは、珍しい奇妙な動物でも見るかのようにあなたを見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to evade the crowd's attention, only for the commoners to descend upon you like so many vultures. They stare at you as if you were a rare and bizarre animal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆の注目を逃れようとするが、平民たちがハゲワシのように押しかけてくるだけである。彼らは、珍しい奇妙な動物でも見るかのようにあなたを見る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous essayez d'échapper à l'attention de la foule, mais les roturiers s'abattent sur vous tels une nuée de vautours sur une charogne. Ils vous dévisagent comme si vous étiez un animal des plus étranges.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to evade the crowd's attention, only for the commoners to descend upon you like so many vultures. They stare at you as if you were a rare and bizarre animal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous essayez d'échapper à l'attention de la foule, mais les roturiers s'abattent sur vous tels une nuée de vautours sur une charogne. Ils vous dévisagent comme si vous étiez un animal des plus étranges.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst, der Aufmerksamkeit der Menge zu entgehen, doch die Leute stürzen sich wie die Aasgeier auf dich. Sie starren dich an, als wärst du ein seltenes und bizarres Tier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to evade the crowd's attention, only for the commoners to descend upon you like so many vultures. They stare at you as if you were a rare and bizarre animal.{/n}
